subject: RE Junit with Jython ( slightly off-topic, sorry )
msgSnippet: Dear All, having searched the archives ;) I still have a problem calling JUnit from Jython ( and reflection ). I have used the python unittest built-in before
messageBody:
Dear All,
having searched the archives ;)
I still have a problem calling JUnit from Jython ( and reflection ).
I have used the python unittest built-in before but want to show
a more integrated ( with Java ) demo.
I have found some sample jython code that put me a step forward
( I am using @sig doc string ) and am now failing to compile
to a Java class with jythonc. I am getting failure to find Test class
and unreported exceptions ). This must be a FAQ but I could really
do with a working example that uses suites ( eg a port of the
SimpleTest demo that comes with the JUnit samples ). I am trying
to ask this same question on the jython-users mail list but am
having difficulty registering. If there are any jython users
( of JUnit ) on this list, I would appreciate a leg-up.
Thanks,
David
